body_html:
If you have the error CUDNN_STATUS_BAD_PARAM, make sure that the problem does not come from your code. For example, it happened to me because I gave an empty array as an input to the tensorflow session after the SECOND epoch. My next_batch() function had a bug. This was the reason. I'm running v5 with TF 0.9 built from the sources and it works nicely now.
@tongda @vguizilini @mpkuse @oakkas @achaiah @fancyerii

body:
If you have the error `CUDNN_STATUS_BAD_PARAM`, make sure that the problem does not come from your code. For example, it happened to me because I gave an empty array as an input to the tensorflow session after the SECOND epoch. My `next_batch()` function had a bug. This was the reason. I'm running v5 with TF 0.9 built from the sources and it works nicely now.
@tongda @vguizilini @mpkuse @oakkas @achaiah @fancyerii
